title: Project Paperclip - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/18/18
itunes:title: Project Paperclip - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 4/18/18
description:
George Noory and Dr. Brian Crim discuss his research into Project Paperclip, a program created after World War II to bring former Nazi scientists to the United States to help development of advanced rockets and weaponry.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
